TwitterUser.summary: The TwitterUser class represents a twitter user account and provides methods for interacting with user-centric API methods.

Show.name: Common
Show.summary: Returns extended information of a given user, specified by ID or screen name as per the required id parameter. The author's most recent status will be returned inline.
Show.returns: A new instance of the class.
Show.remarks: This method interacts with the users/show API endpoint. Documentation can be found here: http://dev.twitter.com/doc/get/users/show
Show.exception: Indicates that a required argument was not supplied.
Indicates that an argument supplied was not valid.

Show.name: ByIDWithTokensAndOptions
Show.param: Optional parameters for runtime configuration settings.

example.code:
'-- Declare the user's id variable Dim userId As decimal = 1
'-- Declare the options object for configuration settings Dim options As new OptionalProperties()
'-- Declare our user variable and fetch the user's details Dim user As TwitterResponse(Of TwitterUser) = TwitterUser.Show(tokens, userId, options)
